Journal.Title: Zhongguo Zhong yao za zhi = Zhongguo zhongyao zazhi = China journal of Chinese materia medica

Article.ArticleTitle: [Studies on the flavonoid constituents in herb of Eremosparton songoricum].

AbstractText: To study the chemical constituents from Eremosparton songoricum.
The compounds were isolated with silica gel column chromatography and the structures of these compounds were elucidated by means of spectral analysis.

The seven compounds were identified as: 5,7,4'-trihydroxyflavone (apigenin) (I), 5-hydroxy-7,4'-dimethoxyflavone (II), 5,7-dihydroxy-3',4'-dimethoxyflavone (III), 5,7-dihydroxy-4'-methoxyflavone (acacetin) (IV), 5,7,4'-trihydroxy-3'-methoxyflavone (chrysoeriol) (V), 5,6,3',4'-tetrahydroxy-7-methoxyflavone (pedalitin) (VI) and 5,4'-dihydroxy-7,3'-dimethoxyflavone-4'-O-D-glucoside (flavogadorinin) (VII).
These constituents were obtained from E. songoricum for the first time.
